metadata.title: RHSA-2023:0209: java-1.8.0-openjdk security update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
The java-1.8.0-openjdk packages provide the OpenJDK 8 Java Runtime Environment and the OpenJDK 8 Java Software Development Kit.

Security Fix(es):

* OpenJDK: improper restrictions in CORBA deserialization (Serialization, 8285021) (CVE-2023-21830)

* OpenJDK: soundbank URL remote loading (Sound, 8293742) (CVE-2023-21843)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: OpenJDK: improper restrictions in CORBA deserialization (Serialization, 8285021)

platform: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.0 Extended Update Support
